headline: Arizona Republicans close in on passage of election restrictions
author: Michael McDaniel
sentences:

The Arizona House voted Tuesday to advance two election reform bills that would limit the creation of emergency voting centers and prohibit same-day voter registration.
"If there is a voter who wishes to cast their vote or decide to become a voter on Election Day, we have a safe and secure system in place," said state Representative Judy Schwiebert, D-Phoenix.
